title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7360.4 - Review of variance application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7360.4 - Review of variance application

State Regulations
(a) The

Commission shall review and, following consultation with OCFS, issue a written
determination to the director on each variance application which complies with
the requirements of this Part. (b) When a variance is granted, the Commission's determination shall specify: (1)
the time period for which the variance is
granted; and
(2)
any special
requirements or conditions imposed as a condition of the variance. (c) When a variance is granted, any special requirements or conditions imposed shall become the standard for
the facility's compliance with the particular regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7360.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
